query:
WITH upsert AS (
                INSERT INTO telegram_bot_chat_ids_lender (
                    id, lender_id, chat_id
                )
                VALUES (
                    $1, $2, $3
                )
                RETURNING id, lender_id, chat_id
            )
            SELECT 
                u.lender_id as user_id,
                u.chat_id,
                l.name as "user_name!"
            FROM upsert u
            JOIN lenders l ON l.id = u.lender_id
